name: WRONG Prototype
tagline: Weaponified Reverse pONG - Marmalade Quick demo game - prototype version
body:
### Welcome to the GitHub page for The WRONG prototype

This repository contains the source for a prototype Marmalade Quick game.

It was built as part of a blog series on getting started with Marmalade Quick, by Marmalade employee (and owner of this github account) Nick Smith. Marmalade Quick is 2D rapid development middleware that ships with the Marmalade cross platform SDK. It allows you to code 2D games quickly using Lua and, combined with the regular Marmalade tools, lets you easily publish to mobile platforms, PC and Mac.

The original blog posts started from this page:
http://www.madewithmarmalade.com/blog/building-marmalade-quick-game-nick-smith-part-1-getting-started

The Marmalade website was re-designed in late 2013 and the blog is currently being moved. In the meantime, you may be able to access the old version by replacing "www" with "legacy" in the URLs. For example:
http://legacy.madewithmarmalade.com/blog/building-marmalade-quick-game-nick-smith-part-1-getting-started

### Blog Posts

The Quick blog posts are reproduced below...



### Authors and Contributors
The prototype and blog are both written by Nick Smith @nickmarmalade.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
